changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.resource_relationship_location AS SELECT rl.id, r.name AS resource, rel.name AS relationship, l.name AS location, rl.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, rl.update_date FROM ruleform.resource_authorization rl JOIN ruleform.resource r ON rl.resource = r.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON rl.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.location l ON rl.location = l.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON rl.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON rl.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.resource_relationship_location OWNER TO core;
